body_content.explanation: the act of visualizing something or someone (= forming a picture of it in your mind):
examples: She spent 25 years developing self-help techniques which involve meditation and visualization.
an exercise that can help you with your visualization of a successful future

body_content.explanation: the act or an example of creating an image, etc. to represent something:
examples: I’ve been seeing a lot of interesting work with data visualization happening lately.
You can design interactive visualizations of results.
